meanings.definition: A person who climbs mountains as a sport or profession.
meanings.sent1: The group of mountaineers reached the summit together.
meanings.sent2: Mountaineers often face extreme weather conditions during their expeditions.
meanings.sent3: The mountaineers decided to have a race to the top for fun.
meanings.sent4: In the world of mountaineers, reaching the peak symbolizes great achievement.
meanings.sent5: The mountaineers' passion for climbing is truly inspiring.

meanings.sent1: We will mountaineer up the steep slope carefully.
meanings.sent2: Many adventurers dream of mountaineering in the Himalayas.
meanings.sent3: The friends decided to mountaineer up the hill for a picnic.
meanings.sent4: She had to mountaineer over the rocky terrain to reach the hidden cave.
meanings.sent5: The explorers were excited to mountaineer to the top of the mountain.
